files.name: main.py
files.content:
def printBottles(current):
    print(current, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print(current, "bottles of Slurm..")
    print("Take one down, pass it around..")
    print(current - 1, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print("")

startBot = input("How many starting bottles?")
startBot = int(startBot)
endBot = 1
numStart = startBot

while(startBot < 1):
    print("You must enter 1 or more bottles.")
    print("")
    startBot = input("How many starting bottles?")
    startBot = int(startBot)

print("")

for counter in range (startBot, endBot -1, -1):
    printBottles(counter)

print("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
